subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Greg Schiano has been hamstrung in filling out his coaching staff with the Buccaneers. Chuck Pagano is waiting for a decision on Peyton Manning before he can reshape the Colts.
snippet: Greg Schiano has been hamstrung in filling out his coaching staff with the Buccaneers. Chuck Pagano is waiting for a decision on Peyton Manning before he can reshape the Colts.
